Trigger.name: Jinzuku
Trigger.script:
local self = matches[3] local target = matches[2] if matches[1]:find("lashing out") then self = matches[2] target = matches[3] end
if self == "you" or self == "You" then system.hunting.vars.targetName = target system.hunting.vars.attacking = true end
if system.hunting.funcs.isHuntingTarget(target) then system.hunting.funcs.razeShield() end

regexCodeList.string: ^Stepping to the side of (.+), (you) drive .+ at \w+ kidneys\.$
^(You) flow around (.+), .+ lashing out in a swift strike at \w+ kidneys\.$
^Stepping to the side of (.+), (\w+) drives .+ into \w+ vulnerable kidneys\.$
^Flowing around (.+) like water, (\w+) lashes out with a swift thrust of .+ at \w+ kidneys\.$
